comment.author: Corey
comment.text: I use to be a big Hillary fan. I can no longer support her. She has betrayed us for her own selfish gains. Keeps making promises that she doesn't keep. Now we got proof on black and white by wikileaks on what she really thinks of us. Plus supports baby killing on late term. Oh no.

replies.author: Julia
replies.text: And u gullibly believe 'em..., then u don't know anything about politics

replies.author: Julia
replies.text: Am a political analyst... I am noy support of either candidate.. Both are evil... But Hilary is better.. Come to Nigeria and see how Republican are coming to us to learn d trade of election rigging. I pity America. The fact still remain that both Hilary and Trump are not fit for the seat

replies.author: Corey
replies.text: Excuse me but you do not know me or how much I know about politics. I happen to very aware, informed, educated and researched Extensively in politics. Particularly the Clinton's Corruptions. So before you go off accussing others of not knowing politics why don't you go Self Educate and read Hillary's Emails while your at it not just listen to the Corrupt Clinton Network....that doesn't count.

replies.author: Corey
replies.text: If your Nigeria why are you even speaking to us about this....you need to worry about your own third world country.

replies.author: Travis
replies.text: Sorry, her senatorial record is sterling. She got lots of care for the 9/11 first responders and to rebuild NYC. She actually did the leg work for segregation discrimination. Reporting on "Clinton Corruption" is actually a career for several completely delusional writers. I've read the emails and there is literally nothing that rises to the level of Trump's 4-6 bankruptcies. You have got to be kidding.
